## Welcome!

This blog lists tips and tricks shared during the [FRB-CESAB](https://www.fondationbiodiversite.fr/en/about-the-foundation/le-cesab/) Geek meetings. We love to talk about `R`, `RStudio`, `git`, `GitHub`, `OS`, `Website`, etc. and we are delighted to share our experience with the community.
